类的使用
modele.Card

  • modele中Card的使用

    modele中Card的子类
    修饰符和类型 类 说明
    class  CardWithID
    The CardWithID class is subclass of class Card and provide cardid
    返回Card的modele中的方法
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    Card MapInDesk.findcard​(int x, int y)
    Enter position (x,y) of the key and return the Card witch conforms
    Card MapNode.getcard()
    Get card in this mapnode
    Card MapInDesk.getCardForMove()
    get the Card for the mode move
    Card Player.getcardinhand()
    Get Cardinhand
    Card CardHeap.gettopcard()
    Return the top card in the CardHeap and remove it
    Card Player.getvictorycard()
    Get Vcard
    参数类型为Card的modele中的方法
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    int Compteur.compte​(Desk desk, Card victorycard)
    Calculate points in the map by victorycard of player.Calculate scores by row and by column
    int Compteur.comptecollonnecolor​(Desk desk, Card victorycard)
    Calculate scores by column and colour of victoeycard
    int Compteur.comptecollonnefilled​(Desk desk, Card victorycard)
    Calculate scores by column and filled
    int Compteur.comptecollonneshape​(Desk desk, Card victorycard)  
    int Compteur.comptelignecolor​(Desk desk, Card victorycard)
    Calculate scores by ligne and colour
    int Compteur.comptelignefilled​(Desk desk, Card victorycard)
    Calculate scores by ligne and filled
    int Compteur.compteligneshape​(Desk desk, Card victorycard)
    Calculate scores by line and shape of victorycard
    modele.returnetat MapInDesk.insertcard​(Mapenodekey key, Card card)
    Insert card and notify observer
    Mapenodekey Strategy.insertVirtuel​(Card carinhand, Card victoryCard, MapInDesk map)
    insert a card into the map
    Mapenodekey StrategyA.insertVirtuel​(Card carinhand, Card victoryCard, MapInDesk map)
    Insert card by random number
    Mapenodekey StrategyB.insertVirtuel​(Card cardinhand, Card victoryCard, MapInDesk map)
    Insert card of virtual player
    Mapenodekey[] Strategy.moveVirtuel​(Card victoryCard, MapInDesk map)
    Move a card
    Mapenodekey[] StrategyA.moveVirtuel​(Card victoryCard, MapInDesk map)
    Move card by random number
    Mapenodekey[] StrategyB.moveVirtuel​(Card victoryCard, MapInDesk map)
    Move card of virtual player
    modele.returnetat Player.play​(Desk desk, Mapenodekey key, Card card)
    Insert this.cardinhand to the desk
    void MapNode.setcard​(Card card)
    Set card of this mapnode
    void MapInDesk.setCardForMove​(Card card)
    Store the Card for the mode move
    void CardWithID.setCardID​(Card card)  
    void Player.setcardinhand​(Card cardihand)
    Set cardinhande
    void Player.setvictorycard​(Card vcard)
    Set victoryCard
    参数类型为Card的modele中的构造器
    构造器 说明
    MapNode​(Card card)
    Creat a MapNode with Card,and set disponible=0
    MapNode​(Card card, java.lang.Integer disponible)
    Creat a MapNode with Card, and disponible
